notes_display: In Historical Sketches of the Paper Currency of the American Colonies by Henry Phillips, Jr. (1865). Given to Dr. Jesse C. Green in 1890. Leaf 96X. Signed by John Hart, signer of the Declaration of Independence.
issue_place_s: Burlington, New Jersey, United States of America
issue_obverse_legend_s: THREE POUNDS. | THIS BILL, by an Ordinance of the Provincial Congress, shall pass current in all Payments within the Colony of New-Jersey, for THREE POUNDS, Proclamation Money.  Dated the 20th Day of February 1776. THREE POUNDS.
issue_reverse_legend_s: Three Pounds. | THREE POUNDS. BURLINGTON, in New-Jersey, Printed by Isaac Collins, 1776.
